headline: How to Watch Trump Ohio Rally: Time, Live Stream for GOP Event
author: Alexandra Hutzler
sentences: Dozens of local Republican officials sent a letter to Trump urging him against the endorsement, citing his previous unflattering remarks about Trump and his supporters.
